Crowd Levels & Timing Suggestions: Most of the time you are able to sea dolphins
Siting the dolphin is purely based on the timing and luck.
Got to see dolphins even when it was around 5 pm.
visit the place in late afternoons or early evening to avoid the scorching heat
visit the place before it's dark since they will stop the boating to avoid high tides under the gravity of the moon.
Best time to see dolphins is early mornings or evening around 4-5pm

There is no time barrier like going early morning we will see dolphin but this is not true, because we went twice, first time it was around 8 and second time it was after 10 in the morning and both of the time we saw dolphins
Visit the place before 5 pm as the dolphin comes to surface for the sunlight.
After sunset the don't come to the surface because of which you won't be able to see them.
It is recommended to visit the place by 09.30, that's when the boats start for dolphins visit
Can spend 40 to 50 minutes
Went in the evening, good to see the sunset
Go as early as possible to get the early boats.
Recommended to go in the evening to see the broad sunset
Mostly you'll get to see at morning time.

We went a bit late around 11am
Early mornings mean less boats and less noise, thereby encouraging dolphins to venture out more freely
Location Specific: point amongst the tourist who want to see dolphin in the open sea
The boating point is on the way to upper Auguda fort.
Dolphin point is located approximately 10 min ferry ride before aguada jail road.

Comparisons & Alternatives: If you have already completed your Grand Island package for various water sports activities and scuba diving then there is no need to go for separate dolphin seeing tour. The sea area and boat way is same when you visit Grand Island.
Weather & Best Season to Visit: First we went to Auguda fort when it got sunny we came down to Dolphins Point boarding area.
Take this trip if you wanna spend 1 hour in the Sun
Accessibility & Mobility: If you are in Panjim, go for it
Waiting Times: We were lucky that after buying the ticket we immediately got the boat (12 seater) with no waiting time
Sometimes we will have to wait for 5-10mins till the boat fills up.
Parking: Two wheelers parking is free with the ride.
2 wheeler and limited 4 wheeler free parking available
